You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &barwed;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Barwed;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2306/index.htm U+02306].
  * `&barwed;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2305/index.htm U+02305].
